sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Good morning, Europe. It's Monday, the 28th of March. Thank you for joining us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Let's begin by looking at our top story.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky says he's open to compromise on the status of the Donbass region as Ukraine prepares for another round of peace talks with Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: French President Macron warns against escalating tensions with Moscow after Joe Biden appears to call for regime change in Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: And Koda wins Best Picture at this year's Academy Awards as Will Smith brings real-life drama to the stage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: For God's sake, this man cannot remain in power.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: US President Joe Biden's unscripted remark at the end of a speech in Poland has raised a few eyebrows and left the US administration scrambling to clarify its meaning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken was quick to stress that Biden was not calling for an immediate change of government in Moscow, but was simply making the point that Putin cannot be empowered to wage war or engage in aggression against Ukraine or anyone else.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We do not have a strategy of regime change in Russia or anywhere else for that matter.

sentences.sentence: In this case, as in any case, it's up to the people of the country in question. It's up to the Russian people.

sentences.sentence: The Kremlin dismissed Biden's remarks, saying that's not for Biden to decide.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The president of Russia is elected by Russians. This speech and the passages which concern Russia is astounding, to use polite words. Meanwhile, French President Emmanuel Macron warned against a verbal escalation of the situation. I think that first of all all we have to be factual and then we have to do everything to prevent the situation from getting out of hand.

sentences.sentence: I won't use this kind of language because I'm still talking with President Putin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Because what do we want to do collectively?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We want to stop the war that Russia has started in Ukraine without going to war and without escalation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: And in the UK, British Education Secretary Nadhim Zahawi also distanced his government from comments made by the American president. The next round of face-to-face Ukraine peace talks could start as early as today.

sentences.sentence: The Interfax agency reports that Presidents Putin and Erdogan in a phone conversation on Sunday agreed that the talks will take place in Istanbul.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And on Sunday, the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky, gave an interview to several journalists from several independent Russian media, including Meduza and Dozhd TV, Dmitry Muratov. However, Russia's communications watchdog issued a warning prohibiting the publication of the interview.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the Kremlin had furiously reacted to Joe Biden's suggestion that Vladimir Putin could not remain in power.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken has promised Washington will work alongside its allies to stop Iran from producing nuclear weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Blinken made his comments ahead of a special gathering with his Israeli and Gulf Arab counterparts where the Iranian deal was expected to be top of the agenda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: BLINKEN, U.S. Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs and Foreign Affairs, We are both committed, both determined that Iran will never acquire a nuclear weapon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The United States believes that a return to full implementation of the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action is the best way to put Iran's nuclear program back in the box that it was in but has escaped from since the United States withdrew from that agreement. But Robert Malley, US Special Envoy for Iran, announced that the US will maintain sanctions on the Iranian Revolutionary Guard and the Islamic Republic's ideological army at the Doha Forum on Sunday, much to the disappointment of Iran's leaders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: IRJC is a national army and a national army cannot be listed as a terrorist group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And certainly it is not acceptable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: That is very important for Iranians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Tehran has stepped up negotiations in recent months to revive the 2015 agreement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The European Union's top diplomat, Joseph Borrell, says he hopes a deal will be possible and that world powers could iron out their issues in a matter of days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Yemen's Houthi rebels have announced a three-day truce and raised the prospect of a permanent ceasefire if the Saudi-led coalition ends its operations against the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The move came as a rally was held in Sana'a to mark the seventh anniversary of the intervention of the coalition in Yemen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The head of the Houthi political office declared his full readiness to release all the coalition prisoners, including the brother of the Yemeni president and prisoners loyal to the internationally recognized government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He said this would be in exchange for the full release of all prisoners who are with the coalition and their various components.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The statement came a day after an overnight airstrike by the Saudi-led coalition targeting Sana'a. The retaliatory strikes came after a wave of drone and missile attacks hit targets across Saudi Arabia by the Houthi group. The 16 targets included an oil plant near the Formula One racetrack in Jeddah, triggering an inferno. The conflict has killed tens of thousands of people, mostly civilians, and left millions facing starvation and disease.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Labour delegates cheer as Malta's governing party claim victory following a general election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Final results are still not yet out, but Malta's two main parties, Labour and the Nationalist Party, took samples to ascertain the preliminary result.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Robert Abele said in a call with TVM News that his party had won a majority while in the counting hall in the city of Naxar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The vote saw its lowest turnout to the polls in decades at 85.5 per cent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: A pillion polls had shown an inevitable Labour win despite a lacklustre campaign hampered by coronavirus restrictions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The party is also tainted by the high-level corruption exposed by investigative journalist Daphne Caruana Galizia, who was killed by a car bomb in October 2017.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: A public inquiry last year found the state under former Prime Minister Joseph Muscat created a culture of impunity in which her enemies felt they could silence her.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Abele took over in January 2020 and has since moved to strengthen good governance and press freedom.
